column2: "Enuanom minyim dɛ merekasa kyerɛ hɔn a wonyim mbra no n’adzeban. Ana hom nnyim dɛ mber tsentsen a nyimpa tse ase no
column3: mbra no dzi no do tum?"

column2: "Na ɔbaa a ɔwɔ kun no wɔdze mbra no kyekyer no fam no kun mber tsentsen a ɔtse ase nyina; na sɛ kun no wu a
column3: wɔasan no efi kun no ne mbra no ho."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi kun no tse ase no
column3: sɛ ɔdze noho kɔbɔ banyin bi ho a
column5: na sɛ kun no wu a
column7: ntsi sɛ ɔdze noho kɔbɔ banyin bi ho a

column2: "Dɛm ntsi
column3: enuanom
column4: dɛmara na hom so wɔnam Kraest nyimpadua do eku hom ama mbra no
column5: ma hom dze homho akɔbɔ ɔfofor ho
column6: mekyerɛ nyia woenyan no efi ewufo mu no

column2: "Na yɛwɔ honam mu no
column3: bɔn ne nhyɛdodze a ɔnam mbra no do no yɛɛ edwuma wɔ hɛn nyimpadua mfafakuwa mu dze soow aba maa owu."

column2: "Na afei yeewu ama dza nkyɛ ɔdze hɛn mu no ntsi
column3: wɔasan hɛn efi mbra no ho
column4: ma yaasom wɔ sunsum foforyɛ mu
column5: na nnyɛ kyerɛw dadaw no mu a."

column2: "Dɛm a nna yɛbɛka dɛn? Mbra no nye bɔn anaa? Dabida
column3: naaso mennhu bɔn gyedɛ ɔnam mbra no do: nkyɛ minnyim enyiber gyedɛ mbra no kaa dɛ

column2: "Na bɔn nam mbrasɛm no do nyaa kwan yɛɛ enyiber nyina wɔ mo mu: na sɛ mbra nnyi hɔ a
column3: bɔn ewu."

column2: "Na emi dze
column3: mukwetsii mbra no bɔɔ bra pɛn

column2: "na emi dze muwui
column3: na mbrasɛm no ara a ɔbɔɔ me nkwa ho anohoba no
column4: ɔnoara so na ɔdze me kɔr owu mu."

column2: "Na bɔn nam mbrasɛm no do nyaa kwan daadaa me
column3: na ɔnam do kum me."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi mbra no yɛ krɔnkrɔn
column3: na mbrasɛm no yɛ krɔnkrɔn

column2: "Nna tserɛ dza ɔyɛ papa no daan owu maa me nye no? Dabida
column3: na mbom bɔn
column4: ama ɔaada edzi dɛ ɔyɛ bɔn ntsi
column5: na ɔnam dza ɔyɛ papa no do dze wu aba mo do

column2: "Na yenyim dɛ mbra no yɛ sunsum mu adze
column3: na emi dze
column4: meyɛ honamnyi a wɔatɔn me akɔ bɔn ase."

column2: "Na dza meyɛ no
column3: minnyim: na nnyɛ dza mepɛ na meyɛ

column2: "Na sɛ meyɛ dza memmpɛ a
column3: megye to mu dɛ mbra no ye."

column2: "Na afei nnyɛ emi na meyɛ
column3: na bɔn a ɔtse mo mu no a."

column2: "Na minyim dɛ papa biara nntse mo mu
column3: mekyerɛ me nyimpasu mu; osiandɛ papayɛ ho pɛ dze
column5: na mbom mbrɛ minsi nyɛ dza oye no na munntum."

column2: "Na papa a mepɛ no mennyɛ
column3: na bɔn a memmpɛ no

column2: "Na sɛ dza memmpɛ no
column3: na meyɛ a
column4: nna nnyɛ emi na meyɛ bio
column5: na bɔn a ɔtse mo mu no a."

column2: "Nna muhu mbra bi dɛ emi a merepɛ papa ayɛ no
column3: bɔn nye me tse."

column2: "Na mo mu nyimpa afamu dze m’enyi gye Nyankopɔn mbra ho;"
"naaso muhu mbra fofor bi wɔ me nyimpadua mfafakuwa mu a ɔnye m’adwen mbra ko
column3: dɛ ɔfa me ndɔmmum ma bɔn a ɔwɔ me nyimpadua mfafakuwa mu no."

column2: "Ao
column3: ɔwerɛhonyi a metse dɛm! Woana beyi me efi dɛm owu nyimpadua yi mu?"

column2: "Na afei menam hɛn Ewuradze Jesus Kraest mu da Nyankopɔn ase! Na afei mankasa dze
column3: medze m’adwen som Nyankopɔn ne mbra
